message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a fair split where I get $550000 and you get $450000. Since we both face 10% inflation per round, it's in our mutual interest to agree now rather than delaying. This offer gives us both a substantial amount right away without risking depreciation.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer. To ensure fairness and considering the inflation impact, I propose an even split of $500000 each. This way, we both lose equally if the game continues. Letâ€™s agree now and take an equal share to avoid further depreciation.
